addressLine1: Orhangazi, Esenyalı Orhangazi Mah, Alparslan Türkeş Cd No:2/A.
mainPageClinicamberDesc: Clinicamber is a dental polyclinic located in Pendik, Istanbul, distinguished by its modern equipment and expert staff. With a child-friendly approach, it offers a safe and warm treatment environment especially for young patients, and provides specialized solutions for different age groups with its team of doctors specialized in pediatric dental health.
mainPageComfortDesc: Thanks to its spacious interior design and technological infrastructure, we provide our patients with both a comfortable and effective treatment process. Our clinic has a strong, friendly, and experienced team; offering a wide range of solutions from surgical operations to general dentistry services.
mainPageSmileDesc: At Clinicamber, we combine health and safety to ensure every individual achieves a healthy smile.
